Title: Requires the surrender of antique firearms, black powder rifles, black powder shotguns, or muzzle-loading firearms following certain convictions
Summary: Requires the surrender of antique firearms, black powder rifles, black powder shotguns, or muzzle-loading firearms following a conviction for a felony or serious offense or following a report pursuant to section 9.46 of the mental hygiene law.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to the surrender of antique firearms, black powder rifles, black powder shotguns, or muzzle-loading firearms following certain convictions
